item.description:
Frankie Avalon, Annette Funicello, Don rickles & Paul Lynde From 1965.

In the fourth of the highly successful Frankie and Annette beach party movies, a motorcycle gang led by Eric Von Zipper kidnaps singing star Sugar Kane managed by Bullets, who hires sky-diving surfers Steve and Bonnie from Big Drop for a publicity stunt. With the usual gang of kids and a mermaid named Lorelei.

What movie series about Beaches wouldn't have two classic movies . Jaws and any movie starring the original Mouseketeer Annette w/hearthrop singing star of the time Frankie Avalon. This is so squeaky clean.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans
